div.p: CONGRATULATIONS to our MHS Basketball teams on a great season! Our Buffaloes were the Regional Champions. Our Lady Buffaloes were the Regional Runners-up. Our girls took...
CONGRATULATIONS to our MHS Basketball teams on a great Regional tournament! Our Buffaloes are the Regional Champions! Our Lady Buffaloes are the Regional Runners-up. ...
GOOD LUCK to our MHS Basketball teams! They will participate in the Rolla Regional tournament this week. Our girls will host Fowler Tuesday evening at 7:00pm at Meade. Our...

div.p: USD 226 Breakfast & Lunch Menu for April 20 - 24.

Knock knock.
Who's there?
A little old lady.
A little old lady who?
Dang! All this time, I had no idea you could yodel. =]
Enjoy a great week and stay safe.

Parents: Meade USD 226 is conducting a survey to get feedback regarding the "stay at home learning plan" started 3 weeks ago. Please use the following link to complete this by next Monday, April 21st. Thanks! https://forms.gle/oXf5m5b5c7ErMrDB8
Meade USD 226 is trying to recognize our seniors by putting a sign like this in all their yards. Thanks to Tanya Marceau, Lori Bigler, and the MHS staff for their work on this.
We are still waiting on spring pictures here at the GS. Once we receive them we will deliver them personally or via mail.

Meade residents are being asked to complete the 2020 Census online at my2020census.gov or by phone at 844-330-2020. Sadly, Meade city residents will not receive a mailer to complete a written census form. Thank you for your help! This short video explains why it is so important.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=df6_rDFyVOQ
